description: Teaches you how to summon this mount.  This mount changes depending on your Riding skill and location.
name: Turbo-Charged Flying Machine

spell.name: Turbo-Charged Flying Machine
spell.description: Summons and dismisses a Turbo-Charged Flying Machine.  Requires 375 engineering skill to ride.  This mount changes depending on your Riding skill and location.

requiredAbility.name: Artisan Riding
requiredAbility.description: You can now learn to ride fast flying mounts from your riding trainer.
